title: Chipotle Refuses Service to Brooklyn NYPD Officers?
subtitle: Did Chipotle workers in Brooklyn refuse service to eight uniformed NYPD officers?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Employees at a Chipotle Mexican Grill in Brooklyn refused service to eight uniformed NYPD officers after making a “hands up, don’t shoot” gesture to indicate their distaste for the policemen.
